mapper.sql: ASSEMBLY_RESULT_ID, RESULT_CODE, ALL_TRANS_PRICE, RATE, BASE_TRANS_PRICE, ALL_SUBSIDY, TRAILER_ID, MAX_QUANTITY, CAR_COUNT, CITY_COUNT, UNIT_COUNT, TRANS_PLAN, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE

a.ASSEMBLY_RESULT_ID, a.RESULT_CODE, a.ALL_TRANS_PRICE, a.RATE, a.BASE_TRANS_PRICE, a.ALL_SUBSIDY, a.TRAILER_ID, a.MAX_QUANTITY, a.CAR_COUNT,CITY_COUNT, a.UNIT_COUNT, a.TRANS_PLAN, a.BILL_STATUS, a.CREATOR, a.CREATE_DATE, b.USER_NAME as REF_CREATE_NAME

where 1=1 and a.ASSEMBLY_RESULT_ID = #{assemblyResultId} and a.RESULT_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{resultCode},'%') and a.ALL_TRANS_PRICE = #{allTransPrice} and a.RATE = #{rate} and a.BASE_TRANS_PRICE = #{baseTransPrice} and a.ALL_SUBSIDY = #{allSubsidy} and a.TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId} and a.MAX_QUANTITY = #{maxQuantity} and a.CAR_COUNT = #{carCount} and a.CITY_COUNT = #{cityCount} and a.UNIT_COUNT = #{unitCount} and a.TRANS_PLAN = #{transPlan} and a.BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus} and a.CREATOR = #{creator} and a.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate}
mapper.insert: insert into ai_assembly_result (RESULT_CODE, ALL_TRANS_PRICE, RATE, BASE_TRANS_PRICE, ALL_SUBSIDY, TRAILER_ID, MAX_QUANTITY, CAR_COUNT, CITY_COUNT, UNIT_COUNT, TRANS_PLAN, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE) values (#{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allTransPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{baseTransPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{allSubsidy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into ai_assembly_result RESULT_CODE, ALL_TRANS_PRICE, RATE, BASE_TRANS_PRICE, ALL_SUBSIDY, TRAILER_ID, MAX_QUANTITY, CAR_COUNT, CITY_COUNT, UNIT_COUNT, TRANS_PLAN, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allTransPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{baseTransPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{allSubsidy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update: update ai_assembly_result RESULT_CODE = #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALL_TRANS_PRICE = #{allTransPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RATE = #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BASE_TRANS_PRICE = #{baseTransPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALL_SUBSIDY = #{allSubsidy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MAX_QUANTITY = #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_COUNT = #{carCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_COUNT = #{cityCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT_COUNT = #{unitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRANS_PLAN = #{transPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, where ASSEMBLY_RESULT_ID = #{assemblyResultId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ai_assembly_result set RESULT_CODE = #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALL_TRANS_PRICE = #{allTransPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RATE = #{rate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BASE_TRANS_PRICE = #{baseTransPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ALL_SUBSIDY = #{allSubsidy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MAX_QUANTITY = #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CAR_COUNT = #{carCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_COUNT = #{cityCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT_COUNT = #{unitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRANS_PLAN = #{transPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ASSEMBLY_RESULT_ID = #{assemblyResultId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select from ai_assembly_result a join bd_user b on a.creator = b.user_id order by CREATE_DATE desc
